thread.title: Local boutique offers scandalously cheap prices
thread.title_full: Local boutique offers scandalously cheap prices

author: Kelly Swoope
title: Local boutique offers scandalously cheap prices
text:
Previous Next 
BALTIMORE - The name says it all, La Chic Boutique. While their fashions are classy and sophisticated like Olivia Pope from 'Scandal" wears, you can find them here in North Baltimore for a quarter to a third of the price Pope pays. 
Whether you want to accent a skirt with a stylish wrap like Good Morning Maryland's Ashley James is sporting, or be glammed from head to toe like Pope on her way to a state dinner, the owner of the Boutique says they have all the big names from Anthropology to Chanel. 
They even got the goods to cover up that fancy outfit. Ponchos in every shape and color. You could almost credit Olivia Pope for making ponchos return to the scene. 
She's wearing at least one an episode, but instead of paying thousands for yours, you can find one at La Chic for a fraction of the price. Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
